message.content:
We need to “build” the inventory value from the transactions. In this problem the only “inventory‐related” transactions are the purchase/sale ones. (No beginning inventory is given so the “Inventory Initial Value” is assumed to be zero.) Then the ending inventory is computed using the basic (periodic) inventory formula:

  Ending Inventory = Beginning Inventory + (Total purchased value) – (Cost of goods sold)

Step‐by‐step:

1. In the table the only “Initial” type rows are for cash, bank and fixed assets. None of those represent merchandise inventory so the beginning (initial) inventory is 0.

2. Every row with type “Purchase” (but not ones with “Fixed Assets Purchase”) adds to inventory. (You can check each purchase row’s “amount” – it is computed as quantity × cost_per_unit.) Summing all purchase amounts we get

  Purchase20231231001 680000.0  
  Purchase20231231002 80500.0  
  Purchase20231231003 342000.0  
  Purchase20231231004 43350.0  
  Purchase20231231005 1480000.0  
  Purchase20231231006 406000.0  
  Purchase20231231007 137280.0  
  Purchase20231231008 1310000.0  
  Purchase20231231009 763200.0  
  Purchase20231231010 315000.0  
  Purchase20231231011 36450.0  
  Purchase20231231012 288000.0  
  Purchase20231231013 103600.0  
  Purchase20231231014 339000.0  
  Purchase20231231015 132880.0  
  Purchase20231231016 665280.0  
  Purchase20231231017 230560.0  
  Purchase20231231018 316500.0  
  Purchase20231231019 57750.0  
  Purchase20231231020 299520.0  
  Purchase20231231021 348000.0  

When we add these “amount” numbers the total purchase value comes to

  8,374,870.00

3. Every “Sale” row represents a sale of inventory. In the “Sale” rows the “cost_amount” (the cost of the sold inventory) is given. When we sum all the “cost_amount” over the many sale rows it comes to

  503,930.00

4. Then the ending inventory is

  Ending Inventory = 0 + 8,374,870.00 – 503,930.00 = 7,870,940.00

Thus the solution is:

{
  "solution": {
    "Inventory Initial Value": "0.00",
    "Inventory End Value": "7870940.00"
  }
}
